overview:
Mark is an associate at SEP and focuses on information technology investments.

Before joining SEP he was European Director of Sensory Networks, a venture-backed global network content security company.

As well as commercial experience, Mark has research experience in the semiconductor and telecommunications sectors. He researched high speed semiconductors with Australiaâ€™s Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation and the University of California, Santa Barbara, and has also done consultancy work for Fortune 500 companies including work on Boeingâ€™s space programme.
